    • Method Detail

      • search

        public void search​(java.lang.String term,
                   boolean useCache,
                   boolean quick,
                   BaseObserver observer)
        Description copied from interface: Controller
        Delegates searching for item to Model and passes along the observer. Updates observer with exception if term is empty or null.
        Specified by:
        search in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        term - The term to search on.
        useCache - Whether to use cached data.
        quick - Whether to use quick search.
        observer - The observer to update in case of error.

      • getNutrition

        public void getNutrition​(Food food,
                         java.lang.String measure,
                         boolean useCache,
                         BaseObserver observer)
        Description copied from interface: Controller
        Delegates retrieving nutrition to the Model and passes along the observer. Updates observer with exception if food or measure is empty or null.
        Specified by:
        getNutrition in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        food - The food item to retrieve nutritional information for.
        measure - The size to use.
        useCache - Whether to use cached data.
        observer - The observer to update in case of error.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(Food food,
                        Nutrition nutrition,
                        java.lang.String size,
                        BaseObserver observer)
        Description copied from interface: Controller
        Delegates sending messages to the Model and passes along the observer. Updates observer with exception if food or size is empty or null.
        Specified by:
        sendMessage in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        food - The food item to generate the report for.
        nutrition - The nutrition item to use in the report.
        size - The size for the nutritional information.
        observer - The observer to update in case of error.
